concept.title: Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use Gzip, Bzip2, Snappy, and LZO compression with the Local FS destination. To use LZO compression with the destination, you need to configure the to enable LZO compression.

conbody.p: Local FS destinationcompressioncompressionfor the Local FS destinationOther compression formats do not require additional configuration.Doc-Make sure updates in this topic get into the Hadoop FS version.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO compression with only one version of Local FS. If you installed multiple libraries that include the Local FS destination, make sure to configure the to use compression with the version that you want to use. checking on this - need to add Hadoop fs?
